p: Uncertainties in projections of climate change impacts on agro-ecosystems are due to several factors including differences in climate and crop models, emission scenarios and down-scaling techniques [ 65, 66]. Future greenhouse gas emission estimates are also strongly affected by socio-economic development and political strategies which contribute to another source of uncertainty. There are also some uncertainties generated from the inherent model structure and the model calibration, parameterization and evaluation [ 61, 65].
